article.headline: Louisiana-Monroe 105, Alcorn St. 75
article.story: MONROE, La. (AP) -- Tony Hooper scored 27 points to spark Louisiana-Monroe's 105-75 win over visiting Alcorn State on Tuesday. Hooper, a junior guard, got all but two of his points in the first half to help Louisiana-Monroe overcome a slow start and build a 59-38 advantage at the half. Jonas Brown added 20 for the Warhawks (2-4), Jordan Payne had 18 and Mitchell Hampton had 14. The Warhawks trailed Alcorn (0-4) in the game's opening minutes, but Hooper heated up, hitting his firt 3-pointer to tie the score at 5-5. He then got a crowd-pleasing dunk on a fast break.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
